Merck’s COVID-19  treatment pill Molnupiravir gets FDA EUA today - 5 day course

Decreased hospitalization by 30%

CONS- less effective, only for >|=18 yrs, not recc. in pregnancy

PROS - more doses available in US than Paxlovid, less drug interactions

An important addition to our COVID mitigation toolkit.

5 day oral course of Paxlovid - (combination nirmatrelvir- ritonavir) given within 5 days of symptom onset, cuts risk of hospitalization by 89%

Should you pass on a COVID booster now and wait for a possible omicron vaccine?? 

NO -get the booster of the current vaccine NOW if eligible  Why? 
1. Omicron vaccine is several months away
2. Delta is still surging in US 
3. Boosters may provide some protection to omicron
